description: Monitor authentication logs and analyze for unusual access patterns. A remote desktop logon, through RDP, may be typical of a system administrator or IT support, but only from select workstations. Monitoring remote desktop logons and comparing to known/approved originating systems can detect lateral movement of an adversary. Analytic 1 source="*WinEventLog:Security" EventCode="4624" AND LogonType="10" AND AuthenticationPackageName="Negotiate" AND TargetUserName="Admin*")
